blurb: The “Linked Discourses on the Breakthrough” contains 11 discourses on the value of realizing the Dhamma. Each discourse features a memorable simile illustrating the truly momentous implications of seeing the four noble truths.
For someone who has seen the truth, the suffering eliminated is like the great earth; what remains is like the dirt under a fingernail.

translations.author: ইন্দ্রগুপ্ত ভিক্ষু, বঙ্গীস ভিক্ষু, অজিত ভিক্ষু
Claude Le Ninan, Chandhana Le Ninan

translations.lang_name: မြန်မာဘာသာ
translations.author: Pitaka Myanmar Translation

blurb: For someone who has seen the truth, the suffering eliminated is like the water in a massive dam; what remains is like a few drops on a blade of grass.
